title: BLACK SCREEN IN DRAFT LOBBY!
body: This is the third time that ive accepted into a match and got this black screen in the draft lobby. Ive been suspended 3 times now because of this and lost 23LP because of it! Get it fixed.

replies.body:
Seconded, although I simply get kicked out of queue over and over; whatever they were trying
to accomplish by making a new client when this is what we get is beyond me. 
Yes, I read all the flowery blubbergush, but fact is the
game hates the new client and the smallest tweak seems to have the potential to make it all unplayable!
From day one, it's been inferior in any and all ways from what we had before.

Hate to rant but this really just came to a head for me.
